ISSUE.TITLE: Project contacts add UserGroup
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Feature Request add the possibility to add usergroups as contacts to projects ### Use case you can add a usergroup (with all members) in one step and do not have to add the members of this individually ### Suggested implementation 1. insert a line to select groups at /projet/contact.php 2. after selection & adding: i see two options to handle A) copy all members of the group into contacts or B) keep the group and link always to actual group members ### Suggested steps _No response_
